# rgeopi

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

rgeopi exists to extract project information from GDOT's public-facing GeoPI system.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rgeopi from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ModernMobilityPartners/rgeopi")
```

This package was developed by Modern Mobility Partners.
